loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 29-year-old married man, father of three beautiful children. He has been working in construction for eight years, and he is specialized in cement work. His business is improving but he needs more cash to buy necessary iron and wood pillars that are so helpful in his business, so that's why he applied for a Youth loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua.

This is his first time experiencing Al Majmoua loans and he hopes it will reflect positively on his social and financial situation.

Ali is a man with a very good reputation. He is a hard worker who never says I'm tired; he always searches for more work to accomplish.

He hopes he can develop his business more in the future, to open a big contracting and developing company.

loans.use: To buy necessary iron and wood pillars to improve his business.

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en:
Abeer is a 29-year-old married woman who has three children. Her husband owns a shop selling evening dresses and special accessories. He opened the shop almost a year ago. Abeer sometimes helps her husband in the shop – she measures the customer and takes their notes as they are both female.
With this understanding of customers, and knowing the need to enhance and improve the shop's products, Abeer has decided to apply for a loan in order to buy more products and dresses for all age categories, which are still fashionable.

loans.use: to buy more dresses for all age categories.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 43 years old, married, with four children. He sells food such as rice and tea to earn a living and has been in the business for 10 years. He employs two people. He earns extra income from his rental rooms. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for a loan of 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy utensils and sugar.

loans.use: To buy utensils and sugar.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter has applied for his third loan from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loans successfully. Peter will use the loan to service the vehicle. The business is doing well. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy another vehicle which will increase his income.

loans.use: To service the vehicle and renew the p.s.v. insurance cover.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
Jose Santos, tiene 33 años, soltero, vive en San Jose, departamento de Lempira, junto con una hermana.
Jose, en busca de obtener ingresos, hace tres años estableció un negocio de una pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar, como maíz, frijoles, arroz, azúcar, pan, café, harina, pastas, sal huevos, refrescos, etc.  Además el a trabajado en la agricultura y cultiva granos básicos, un tiempo lo dedica al negocio y otro a la agricultura. Atiende a sus clientes desde las 6:00 a.m a 7:00 p.m, para atender la pulpería le ayuda su hermana. Para surtir el negocio ha solicitado préstamos a ODEF, este actual es el cuarto préstamo y lo va invertir en productos como arroz, azúcar, carnes, jabón, harina y refrescos. Los préstamos le han ayudado a incrementar el inventario, su negocio se ve diferente. De las ganancias desea arreglar su casa.
texts.en:
Jose Santos is 33 years old and single.  He lives with his sister in San Jose in the Lempira department.  Three years ago, looking to get an income, he established a mini-market business.  He sells food staples like corn, beans, rice, sugar, bread, coffee, flour, pastas, salt, eggs, and soft drinks, etc. 

He also has worked in agriculture, and he grows basic grains.  He devotes part of his time to the business and the other part to farming.  He tends to his customers from 6:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m.  His sister helps him take care of the store.

In order to stock the business he has requested loans from ODEF.  This current one is his fourth loan.  He will use the loan to buy products like rice, sugar, meat, soap, flour, and soft drinks.  The loans have helped him increase the inventory, and his business looks different.  

He wishes to fix up his house with the earnings.

loans.use: to stock his business with products like rice, sugar, meat, soap, flour, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional home supplies for his shop such as plates, knives, plastic items, and other things.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 19-year-old Lebanese single man. He lives with his parents and one sibling. His father is the primary one who is responsible for his family's needs and demands. As for Ahmad, he decided to start his own business as a construction worker in 2008. He is a hard worker looking to serve his customers as quickly as he can. 

Today, Ahmad is in need of a loan of $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase new construction tools for his business. This loan will facilitate his business operations and allow him to take on more projects. In the future, he plans to take on bigger projects inside and outside the country.

loans.use: to purchase new construction tools for his business.

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a 31-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and two school-aged children. He is the main income provider in the family and their only support. For this reason, he decided to have his own business, hoping to improve their lives. So, after twelve years of experience working as a barber, he opened his own barber shop in 2003. 

Today, Hussein is requesting to borrow $1100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to change his salon’s interior decoration and purchase new barbering tools. In this way, he will be able to gain additional clients and improve his business. In the future, he plans to enlarge his salon and hire people to work with him.

loans.use: to change his salon’s interior decoration and purchase new barbering tools.

loans.name: Stepan

texts.ru:
Степан с супругой и годовалой дочкой живет в Берегово, Западная Украина. Он занимается изготовлением и размещением рекламы. Офис Степана располагается в удобном месте, прямо в центре города. В этом бизнесе он проработал уже 4 года. Два года назад у него появились конкуренты, но, тем не менее, его профессионализм помогает ему держать марку и по сей день. На данный момент доход Степана немного превышает 5 000 гривен. 

За счет полученного от КИВА кредита Степан надеется приобрести широкоформатный принтер и установить окна в своем офисе.  Закупка широкоформатного принтера поможет увеличить разновидности услуг, которые Степан предоставляет в своей фирме. Новые вставленные окна позволят улучшить теплоизоляцию рабочего помещения, а также на них Степан сможет разместить дополнительную рекламу. Степан получил образование в Венгрии. Он ценит высокое качество в работе и предоставляемых услугах. Его мечта – достичь европейского уровня рекламных услуг и держать планку на высоком уровне и в будущем. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Stepan, his wife and one-year-old daughter live in Beregovo in the west of Ukraine. Stepan produces and distributes advertising. His office is conveniently located in the city centre. He's been in this business for four years. Even after new competition appeared two years ago, Stepan's professionalism has allowed him to maintain his brand to this day. Stepan's current monthly income is slightly above 5000 hryvnia. With the help of this loan from Kiva, he hopes to purchase a large-format printer and to install windows in his office. The printer will expand the range of services that Stepan's company offers. The new windows will improve the insulation of the workspace, plus Stepan will be able to use them for additional advertisement.

Stepan was educated in Hungary. He values high quality in his work and in the services he offers. His dream is to reach the European level of advertising services and to keep the bar high in the future.

loans.use: to buy a large-format printer and install windows in his office

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 54-year-old married Lebanese man living with his wife. He’s working really hard to be able to cover his family needs since he provides the main source of income. Ali decided to start his own business in 1998, so he opened a bakery shop in his town where he’s well known for his delicious food and welcoming place. 

Ali is requesting a 1,600 USD loan from the Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase added raw materials for his business such as flour, sugar, and other items. His loan will help him develop his business and increase his production. In the future, he plans to deliver bread to neighboring areas

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, and other ingredients

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a 48-year-old married Lebanese man living with his wife and two children. One of his children is working while the other is still studying. With the cooperation of his wife, Hussein has been able to pay his child's school fees in addition to all the other family expenses. Since 1981, he has been working in the construction business and waiting for the perfect time to expand in his field. Hussein works independently to meet customer requests.

Hussein is requesting a 1,800 USD loan from the Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase new construction supplies for his business which will enhance his way of living.  In the future, he plans to take on bigger projects outside the country.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies

loans.name: Ihab

texts.en: Ihab is a 20-year-old, single, Lebanese man living with his parents and two siblings. One of his siblings is working and the other is still attending school. His father is responsible for covering the family expenses. Regardless of his young age and unlike other people, Ihab has the ambition to have his own business. He opened his own call center and money transfer shop. Today, he’s asking for a loan of $2100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase some products for his shop such as recharge cards and other needed items. This will boost his business and thus his profits. In the future, he plans to take more Kiva loans in order to improve his work.

loans.use: to purchase recharge cards and other items for his shop

loans.name: Jassem

texts.en: Jassem is a 31-year-old Lebanese man who lives with his wife and only child. He’s the only one responsible for his family and he seeks to offer them a better future. He opened a fish shop twelve years ago, and he’s satisfied with the results he has attained so far. Today, he’s requesting a loan of $2000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase the necessary quantity of fish for his shop. He notes that this will allow him to serve a wider range of people and increase his revenues. In the future, he plans to open his own seafood restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase fish for his shop

loans.name: Osvaldo De Jesus

texts.es: Osvaldo  con su credikiva compró artículos y productos con los cuales su negocio se vio bien surtido y por eso vendió aun más. Su compra en mayor volumen le generó descuentos que se trasladaron a sus utilidades. En la actualidad está aplicando a su segundo credikiva, con el cual comprará muchos mas artículos ajustados a la temporada, a propósito de las fiestas de diciembre, navidad y año nuevo, en las que las familias se reúnen, comparten alimentos, beben, bailan y se visten especialmente para estar en unidad. Con su credikiva comprará bebidas para responder a la demanda de estos artículos, que usualmente en ésta época que se incrementan. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Gracias por los créditos que me han otorgado porque he podido hacer crecer mi negocio y tengo efectivo disponible para las compras,”
texts.en:
With his Kiva loan Osvaldo bought articles and products with which his business was well supplied, and so he sold even more.  His wholesale purchase generated discounts for him that went to his profits.  Currently he is applying for his second Kiva loan, with which he will buy many more items in accordance with the December holiday season, Christmas and New Year, during which families get together, share food, drink, dance, and dress especially to be together.

With his Kiva loan he will buy beverages to meet the demand for these items, which usually grows during this season.

His message to Kiva lenders is the following: "Thank you for the loans you have given me, because I have been able to grow my business and I have cash available for purchases."

loans.use: to buy beverages to meet demand

loans.name: Fadi

texts.en:
Fadi is a 35-year-old man. He’s married, living with his wife and two school-aged children. He’s a hard worker, ready to support his family as well as he possibly can. 

He has been working in installing air conditioners since 2000 on a freelance basis. He is expert in his field and has gained a fair number of customers so far. His wife has been working at the airport for the past three years. 

Today, he’s looking to borrow $3,000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase the needed equipment for his business such as electrical tubes, keys and many other items. This will definitely facilitate his business operations and thus increase his earnings. 

In the future, he plans to open his own electronics shop.

loans.use: to purchase needed equipment for his business such as electrical tubes, keys and many other items.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 50-year-old Lebanese married man. He’s living with his wife and two children who are still attending school. He’s always searching to offer the best he can to his family. For this reason, he opened his own electronics repair shop in 2005. He’s also working as a free-lancer and visits his clients whenever they ask for his services. Today, Ahmad is requesting to borrow 2,600 USD from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase an advanced scanner machine to repair ovens, washing machines, and many other products. In the future, he plans to open his own electronics shop.

loans.use: to purchase an advanced scanner machine to repair ovens, washing machines, and many other products

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en: Ibrahim is a 42-year-old Lebanese married man who lives with his wife and three school-aged children. He’s working non-stop to be able to satisfy his family demands. He has 11 years of experience as a painter and has worked independently, upon request, since the year 2000. In parallel, he has been working in a local company for the past 19 years. Today, he’s asking for a loan of 1,900 USD from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase painting tools and supplies for his projects. He notes that this will help him carry on his work properly. In the future, he plans to open his own painting shop.

loans.use: to purchase painting tools and supplies for his projects

loans.name: Ata

texts.en: Ata is a 55-year-old Lebanese man. He lives with his wife and six children. Five of the children are working while the other one is still attending school. Ata believes that combining forces with the rest of his family will be great to improve their way of living. He has been working as a taxi driver since 2008. He’s accurate and honest, making his customers loyal to him. Today, he’s looking to borrow $1300 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to perform necessary maintenance on his car in addition to painting and bodywork. This will help him to target a wider range of people and increase his earnings. In the future, he plans to buy a minivan to transport more people.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his car, in addition to painting and bodywork

loans.name: Najat

texts.en: Najat is a 35-year-old Lebanese woman living with her husband and five school-aged children. She cooperates with her husband to fulfill her family's needs and pay for her children’s educational fees. Since 2003, her husband has worked as a taxi driver. She decided to open her own mini-market in 2005 in order to take some of the responsibilities off him. Today, she needs to borrow $2600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase extra products for her mini-market, such as soft drinks, sugar, chips, and many other provisions. This will increase her sales and thus her revenues. In the future, she plans to open other branches as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase extra products for her mini-market

loans.name: Tarek

texts.en: Tarek is a 26-year-old Lebanese man. He is single and lives with his parents and one sibling. His father provides the main source of income for the family. In order to help him, Tarek decided to open his own business in 2009. He works as an electrician on his own, and he is looking to grow his business. Today, he wants to borrow $1600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new electrical tools and equipment for his business. He notes that this will facilitate his business operations; therefore, he can take more projects. In the future, he plans to learn more about his trade in order to further improve his work.

loans.use: to purchase new electrical tools and equipment

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is a 44-year-old Lebanese man. He lives with his wife and three children, all of whom are studying. In order to be able to pay his family expenses and his children’s school fees, Ali started his own business in 2006, opening a produce shop in his town. He also has his own coffee shop. Today, he’s asking to borrow $1600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase fruits and vegetables and to install a window for his shop. These improvements will allow him to earn more profits, thus enhancing his way of living. In the future, he plans to deliver fruits and vegetables to neighboring areas.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables and install a window in his shop

loans.name: Sabah

texts.en:
Sabah is a 47-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and three children. One of them is working while two others are still studying. They are a united family, cooperating together in order to enrich their way of living. Her husband started his business as a security guard at a local hotel in 2006. 

As for Sabah, she has been selling Brazilian gold and accessories from her home for the past nine years. She also visits her customers at home. 

Today, she’s asking for a loan of $1,600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase jewelry to add to her existing items in order to boost her sales and earn more income. 

In the future, she plans to open her own jewelry shop.

loans.use: to purchase jewelry to add to her existing items.

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
Anthony is a resident of Kongowea, Kenya. He owns a car wash business which has been running for four years. He is applying for a loan of 80,000 Kenya shillings (KES) to purchase a pressure pump for his car wash.

He also hires out a welding and grinding machine. His main challenges are power failures and water shortages, which bring his business to a halt when they occur. He looks forward to opening a number of car wash centers in the future. The additional income obtained will help improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase a pressure pump for his car wash.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 35 years old, married and has two children. He owns a shop where he sells electrical goods. He has been in the business for three years.  Besides his electrical shop, he does dairy farming for more income generation. He has grown his business since he joined Faulu Kenya because he has been trained in business management skills.

Peter has requested for a loan of 50,000 Kenya shillings to buy cables, bulbs and switches for his shop.

loans.use: to buy cables, bulbs and switches.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to service his lorry.

loans.name: Yuvinza Judith

texts.es: La señora Yuvinza es cliente nueva de la institución, La Sra. Yuvinza vive en un departamento en anticrético ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza de una marca de productos de belleza muy conocida a nivel mundial, los cuales los distribuye en las peluquerías y salones de la zona sur ella tiene un pequeño hijito de unos cinco años  y su esposo trabaja en la empresa de telefonía además tiene una tercera actividad la venta de calzados bata los cuales a cómoda a crédito esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de mercadería ya que ella aprovecha las ofertas de los catálogos para pedir por cantidad para luego venderlos obteniendo mas ganancias, es un apersona muy trabajadora se siente muy agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Yuvinza is a new client of the institution.  She lives in an apartment under the ‘anticrético’ modality [a transaction whereby a property owner requests a "loan" from you in exchange for housing, which must be paid back to you at the end of your contract. If your loan is not repaid, the property owner loses the property to you].  

She sells beauty supplies of a very well-known national brand to barber shops and beauty salons in the southern zone.  She has a little five year old son and her husband works for a telephone company.  She has a third activity also which is the sale of Bata brand shoes that she sells on credit.  

She’s asking for the loan to buy merchandise because she takes advantage of the offers in the catalogues and buys in quantity to then resell obtaining better profits.  She’s a very hardworking person who feels very grateful for the opportunity she’s getting.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and beauty supplies at wholesale.

loans.name: Antony

texts.en: Antony is 36 years old, married with two children aged 3 and 7. He sells motor vehicle spare parts to earn a living, he has been in the business for 8 years and has employed one person. He also repairs vehicles to earn extra income. Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to grow his business. He hopes to expand his business and be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy motor vehicle spare parts.

loans.use: To buy motor vehicle spare parts

loans.name: Kamaran

texts.en: Kamaran lives in Iraq with his wife and four children. For the last 17 years, he has earned a living by running a store where he sells the most basic products every Iraqi household uses: rice, cereals, and the most basic grains and spices. His store is open to everyone, but to serve the lowest-income families, he carries specific items at a government-subsidized rate. In an effort to improve his and his family's living conditions, he previously took out a loan from Relief International-Iraq to repair his house. He has now taken out a new loan, for $1,500, to improve the conditions of his store and maintain the most basic food items Iraqi families purchase from him.

loans.use: to renew his shop, which serves low-income families

loans.name: John

texts.en: John used his previous loan to add to his stock of clothes. With additional stock, his business improved. He is requesting another loan of KES 40,000 to buy clothes. He hopes to expand into a wholesale business in the future.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 27-year-old married man from Sahab, Jordan. He is the father of two children. Ahmad has a sweetmeats shop where he sells sweets that he's made or previously produced ones. He is requesting a loan of 1,000 Jordanian dinars to purchase materials needed in preparing these sweets.

An aspiration of Ahmad's is to expand his business and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase materials needed to produce sweetmeats

loans.name: Bahodur

texts.ru: Баходур проживает в районе Файзобод. Ему 31 год. Он женат. У него двое детей. Баходур предоставляет услугу. Он занимается развозкой пассажиров. Этим видом деятельности занимается восемь лет. Кредит берет для приобретения запчастей и ремонта машины.
texts.en:
Bahodur lives in the region Fayzabad. He is 31 years old and married. He has two children. 

Bahodur provides passenger transportation services. He has been engaged in this activity for eight years. He takes a loan for the purchase of spare parts and for repair of his vehicle.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and repair his vehicle

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 28 years old and is married with three children. For the past 10 years, he has run a barber shop to earn a living and has employed seven people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya Samuel has been able to expand his business.

Samuel is requesting a 70,000 KES loan to buy two shaving machines. In the future, he hopes to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy two shaving machines

loans.name: Rita De Los Angeles

texts.es: Rita de los Angeles de  29 años de edad, desde hace 3 años labora como docente de Educación secundaria  en el Colegio Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell como docente de Español; está solicitando su 5to crédito para invertirlo en mejoramiento del local de una pequeña relojeria que tiene con su esposo, la cual esta ubicada en el mercado municipal, y es atendido por su esposo, y de esta manera brindarle mejores condiciones a sus clientes, ambos comparten con sus deberes  y gastos familiares , en su comunidad es bien reconocida como una persona muy trabajadora de buenas costumbres. Su mayor sueño en la vida es que su familia goze de salud y que no falten el pan de cada dia y amor. Cabe señalar que todos sus creditos los ha utilizado para mejorar su casa, y con el anterior logro terminar su cocina, la que con el apoyo de kiva pudo construir, y por lo que le agradece mucho la oportunidad que se le ha brindado con los financiamientos que le han hecho.
texts.en:
Rita de los Angeles is 29 years old, and for the past three years she has worked as a high school Spanish teacher at the Colegio Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell.

She is seeking her fifth loan in order to invest in the small watch shop that she has with her husband.  The shop is located in the city market, and her husband manages it.   With this investment she wishes to provide improved service to her customers.

She and her husband share their debts and household expenses.  In her community she is well-regarded as a very hardworking, well-mannered person.  Her dream in life is that her family is healthy, that they never go hungry, and that there is always love.

It is worth noting that she has used al her previous loans to improve her home, and with Kiva’s help she was able to build her kitchen.  Thus she is very grateful for the opportunities that these loans have brought her.

loans.use: make improvements to her store.

loans.name: Nasih

texts.en:
Nasih is a married Iraqi man who is the father of four children. In an effort to better provide for his family's needs, he started running a small store in 2008. Nasih first took a loan from Relief International-Iraq to renew the store. After successfully implementing the improvements as well as repaying the loan, he applied and took out a new loan from RI-Iraq in the amount of 3,000 USD to re-stock his now-empty store.

The little store, located in a good business area, will surely be a successful place, attracting local customers from the area. Nasih hopes to provide his customers with a great service, which will allow him to better provide for his children's needs.

loans.use: to re-stock his store and start running his business

loans.name: Jahonsher

texts.ru: Чахоншер занимается скотоводством. Он разводит скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Ему 41 год. Он женат. У него трое детей. Чахоншер берет кредит для увеличения количества скота.
texts.en: Jahonsher is involved in animal husbandry. He raises livestock for later resale. He is 41 years old, is married, and has three children. Jahonsher is requesting a loan to increase his quantity of livestock.

loans.use: To purchase young bulls

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 56 years old and married with four children. He runs a welding shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for 12 years and has employed two people. He earns extra income from his farming activities. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to expand his business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a new welding machine.

loans.use: To buy  a new welding machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase products from Zermat (a catalog), such as cosmetics, perfumes and a variety of clothing.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 50-year-old married man from Gaza. On January 1st, 2011 he opened his own electronics store in which he sells and fixes electriconic products. He hopes that through this loan he will be able to buy a display box and a computer for the store as well. He believes that the display box will attract people’s attention and will bring in more customers to the store.

loans.use: to buy a display box and a computer

loans.name: José

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 53 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y dos de sus cinco hijos.

José tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura, fueron sus padres quienes le enseñaron este trabajo. Él presto sus servicios como militar durante 13 años y actualmente esta recibiendo una pensión por ese servicio.

Para comprar los insumos que necesita para realizar los cultivos, José debe caminar a pie dos kilómetros desde su casa hasta la carretera, para abordar el autobús que recorre una distancia de cinco kilómetros hasta llegar al centro de la ciudad lugar donde compra todo lo necesario. Una vez realizada las compras se regresa a su casa y luego traslada los insumos a pie caminado cinco kilómetros hasta llegar al lugar  donde tiene sus cultivos.

Don José solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para cancelar un crédito vigente y el resto lo invertirá en terminar de sacar el producto cosechado, ya que tendrá que pagar una maquina desgranadora y comprar fertilizantes, dos sacos de abono, dos litros de insecticidas.

Con el préstamo José, pretende obtener su cosecha de calidad, ya que podrá prepararlos mejor y cosecharlos en el tiempo adecuado, para vender  más productos y tener el dinero para cancelar la deuda, aunque también tiene su pensión que le sirve para realizar los pagos y para el sustento de su familia porque le quedara más cantidad de maíz para el gasto de la casa.

José espera realizar un préstamo para ponerle piso a su vivienda, reparar el techo, entre otras mejoras, de esta manera les brindara un hogar digno y con espacio a su familia.
texts.en:
José is 53 years old. He lives with his life's companion and two of their five children.

José has been working in agriculture for many years. His parents taught him this work. He was in the military for 13 years and now he is receiving a pension for that service.

To buy the materials he needs for the crops, José has to walk two kilometers from his house to the road. He rides the bus for five kilometers to the center of town where he buys everything he needs. Once he has made his purchases, he returns home and later walks the materials five kilometers to where he has his crops. 

José is asking Fundación Campo for the loan to pay off an existing loan and to invest the rest in finishing the harvest of the product. He will have to pay for a thresher and buy two sacks of fertilizer, and two liters of insecticide. 

With the loan, José in tends on getting a quality harvest, since he can repair better and harvest with enough time to sell more product and have the money to pay off the debt. He still has his pension, which he can use to make the payments and support his family, but he will have more corn for household expenses.

José hopes to get a loan to put in a floor in his house and repair the roof, among other improvements. In this way, he can offer a worthy, spacious home to his family.

loans.use: to pay off an existing loan and invest the rest in paying for a thresher, buy 2 sacks of fertilizer, and 2 liters of insecticide.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Mohamed is a 42-year-old Iraqi father of two children.

Mohamed owns a lot near the busy streets of the city Bazaar shopping market, which he uses for his parking business, allowing shoppers to park their cars. The lot can hold about 35 cars at once, and it is usually full. The streets of the Bazaar are narrow and cars are not allowed to park on the side of the streets as they quickly fill with people and carts selling all kinds of goods.

The business has been running for 6 years now. In the past, Mohamed successfully applied, received, and repaid a loan taken from Relief International-Iraq, which he used to renovate another building on the lot. Mohamed now takes a loan of 2,000 USD to renovate the little one room shelter building at the entrance of the parking lot, making it easier to work during the cold winter days as well as creating a shelter from the sun for the hot summer.

loans.use: to fix up the little shelter building at his parking lot.

loans.name: Juan Roland

texts.es: El señor Juan actualmente vive por la zona del plan 3000, el solicitante se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa en especial prendas femeninas, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en el mercado de la zona, con esta actividad la viene desarrollando desde hace 5 años. El solicitante actualmente vive en la casa de sus padres a quienes ayuda con los gastos del hogar, con el dinero del crédito comprara mercadería por esta época navideña. El solicitante agradeció a la institución por el apoyo otorgado y por la rapidez en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en:
Juan lives in the neighborhood of Plan 3000.  He works in the purchase and sale of special clothing for women.  His business is located in the areas market, and he has been developing this business for the past five years.  He currently lives with his parents, and he helps them with the household expenses.  

With this loan, he will buy merchandise for the Christmas season.  Juan thanked the institution for the support provided and for granting him this loan in a timely manner.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (i.e., seasonal clothing).

loans.name: Joaquin Alberto

texts.es: Joaquín Alberto es un emprendedor que ya es cliente de Fundación León 2000, en cual su actividad económica a la que se dedica es a una joyería que está ubicada en su casa de habitación donde los visitan sus clientes por la calidad de trabajo que ofrece. Actualmente está solicitando crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra materia prima como oro, perlas y herramientas para la elaboración de prendas.
texts.en:
Joaquín Alberto is a client of Foundation León 2000.  He is an entrepreneur whose main economic activity is a jewelry store that is located in his home.  His customers visit him there for the quality of work that he offers.  

Joaquín Alberto currently requests a loan to invest in his business and purchase raw materials such as gold, pearls, and tools in order to make his wares.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as gold, pearls, and tools in order to make his wares.

loans.name: Edward

texts.en:
Edward is 56 years old. He is married and has one child, and he owns a hotel business in Limuru. Edward has been in the business for 14 years now and gets a monthly income of 63,000 Kenya shillings (KES).
  
This will be Edward’s fourth loan with KADET LTD. He plans to use the entire loan to purchase foodstuffs and a deep freezer. With the profit that he earns, he wants to open another hotel business. 

In the future, he wants to be a successful businessman in the hotel business.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuff and a deepfreezer for his hotel business.

loans.name: Ricardo Humberto

texts.es: Ricardo Humberto de 48 años de edad, habita en casa propia  junto con su compañera de vida. Durante muchos años ha trabajado duramente para sacar adelante a su familia y darle todo lo que se merece. Ricardo posee una pequeña tienda la cual ha logrado establecer en su hogar de residencia. Por el momento la tienda ha sido y es su principal fuente de ingresos y su mayor deseo es que su tienda le siga dando los beneficios que hasta el momento le ha sabido dar. El negocio esta bien ubicado en una zona muy estratégica. Muchas personas lo prefieren ya que él siempre cuenta con los productos de primera necesidad y con precios accesibles, además atiende a sus clientes con el mejor servicio posible. Su sueño es ver florecer su negocio y para esto necesita abastecerlo con más productos de tienda de manera que los clientes siempre encuentren lo que buscan y que cada día lo prefieran más. Esto lo ha hecho tomar la decisión d solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar más mercadería que le permita surtir su tienda y lograr su objetivo. La mercadería que piensa comprar para surtir su tienda es: granos básicos, detergente, golosinas, leche, pan dulce y de mas artículos que los clientes soliciten a la hora de demandar sus productos. Con esto espera lograr sacar adelante a su familia y darles una mejor oportunidad de vida.
texts.en: Ricardo Humberto, age 48, lives in his own home with his partner. He has worked very hard for many years to get his family ahead and give them everything they deserve. Ricardo has a small store in his own home. The store has been and is his main source of income. His greatest desire is for it to continue providing him an income. His business is located in a very strategic area. Many people prefer his store because he always has the basic stables at accessible prices, and he provides the best possible customer service. His dream is to see his store flourish, and for this he needs to stock it with more products so that his customers will always find what they need and keep coming back. For this reason, he has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL for buying more merchandise to stock his store and achieve his goal. He plans to buy: basic grains, detergent, candy, milk, sweet bread and other frequently requested products. With this investment he hopes to be able to get his family ahead and give them better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy: basic grains, detergent, candy, milk, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is 39 years old, and is married with three children ages 1, 4, and 7. 

Charles runs a printing shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for 4 years and has employed two people. He earns extra income from his farming activities. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to save his income and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 60,000 Kenya Shillings (KES) to buy a printing machine.

loans.use: To buy a printing machine.

loans.name: Husen

texts.ru: Хусен более десяти лет занимается животноводством. Он откармливает и продает крупнорогатый скот. Ему 54 года. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Хусен берет кредит для закупа мелко – рогатого скота, чтобы увеличить количество скота.
texts.en: Husen has more than ten years of experience in animal husbandry. He breeds and sells cattle. He is 54 years old, married, and has four children. Husen needs a loan for the purchase of sheep and goats.

loans.use: to buy sheep and goats

loans.name: Khujamkul

texts.ru: Хучамкул проживает в районе А. Джоми. Ему 47 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его сын находится в Российской Федерации. Сам Хучамкул занимается разведением крупно – рогатого скота. Кредит берет для закупа коровы. Он намерен собрать деньги на свадьбу сына.
texts.en: Khujamkul lives in the A. Jomi district.  He is 47 years old, married and has two children.  His son is in the Russian Federation.  Khujamkul is involved in breeding cattle.  He is requesting this loan to purchase a cow.  He intends to save money for his son's wedding.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Aminjon

texts.ru: Аминчон житель района Хуросон. Возраст, 57 лет. Женат. У него шестеро детей. Он имеет высшее педагогическое образование. По профессии он проработал 20 лет. На сегодняшний день Аминчон занимается скотоводством. Он берет кредит для закупа телят. Аминчон хочет построить дом для своего сына.
texts.en: Aminjon is a resident of the Khuroson district.  He is 57 years old, married and has six children.  He has a higher pedagogical education.  Aminjon spent 20 years working in his field.  Today, he is involved in animal husbandry.  He is requesting this loan to purchase calves.  Aminjon wants to build a house for his son.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Charles

texts.en: Charles is 39 years old and married with two children aged three and eight. He runs a hardware store to earn a living. He has been in this business for 14 years and describes his business environment as competitive because there are many people in the hardware business. Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to expand his business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 50,000 Kenyan Shillings to buy iron sheeting, nails and screws.

loans.use: To buy iron sheeting, nails and screws.

loans.name: Welman Asmel

texts.es:
Welman, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 4 y 8 años de edad, él es empleado en una empresa distribuidora de gas propano, desde hace dos años, él lo realiza de una forma ambulante de 7:00 am a 5:00 pm todos los días de la semana, lo transporta en una motocicleta.
El préstamo lo necesita para mejorar su vivienda y comprara los materiales necesarios como: lamina, cemento, hierro, de esa forma lograra que su familia viva en mejores condiciones, ya que cambiara el techo que se encuentra deteriorado.
El sueño de Welman es que sus hijos sigan estudiando y siempre mantener el empleo de esa forma siempre tendrá los recursos para seguir apoyando a su familia.
texts.en:
Welman lives with his wife and his two children who are four and eight years old. He has been an employee at a propane gas distribution company for two years. He is a mobile worker and works from 7:00am to 5:00pm every day of the week. He transports his materials on motorcycle. 
He needs a loan in order to improve his home and purchase necessary materials like: sheeting, cement and iron. With these things, he will be able to allow his family to live in better conditions. Now the deteriorating roof can be changed. 
Welman’s dreams are that his children will continue to study and that he will be able to keep his job, so that he will always have the resources to continue supporting his family.

loans.use: purchase sheeting, cement and iron.

loans.name: Geovanny Francisco

texts.es: Geovanny de 37 años de edad es casado, habita junto a su familia en la colonia de los Angeles. Trabaja como comerciante de pacas de ropa americana, entregando su mercaderia a sus clientes del municipio, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa que ademas se encarga del cuido de sus niños y del hogar. Está solicitando su 1er crèdito para mejora de su vivienda construyendo un dormitorio  en su casa de habitaciòn, y asegurar su casa pues actualmente la delincuencia en el barrio ha incrementado. Geovanny se caracteriza por ser un joven responsable, con principio religiosos, con buen record crèditicio en la zona, tiene capacidad y voluntad de pago, su mayor sueño es de darle un hogar agradable a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Geovanny, 37, is married and lives with his family in the neighborhood of Los Angeles. He works as a merchant selling bundles of American clothing and delivers his merchandise to clients in the city. He has his wife’s support and she also cares for the children and their home.

He is requesting his first home improvement loan and wants to add a bedroom and make his residence secure since crime has been increasing in his neighborhood recently. 

Geovanny is characterized as being a responsible young man with religious principles. He also has a good credit history in the area. He is capable and willing to repay the loan. His greatest dream is to provide a pleasant home for his children.

loans.use: to add a bedroom to his residence.

loans.name: Safarmurod

texts.ru: Сафармурод проживает в районе А. Джоми. Он женат. Ему 42 года. У него трое детей. Его жена занимается торговлей на рынке. Сам Сафармурод занимается торговлей. Он продает свежее мясо. Кредит берет для закупа быка.
texts.en: Safarmurod lives in the A. Jomi district.  He is 43 years old, married and has three children.  His wife is involved in sales at a market.  Safarmurod is also involved in sales.  He sells fresh meat.  He is requesting this loan to purchase a bull.

loans.use: to purchase a bull

loans.name: Sharifmo

texts.ru: Шарифмо проживает в районе Файзобод. Ей 56 лет. Она уже четыре года как занимается торговлей. В основном Шарифмо продает обувь и детскую одежду. Кредит берет для приобретения сезонного товара.
texts.en: Sharifmo lives in the city of Fayzabad.  She is 56 years old.  She has been involved in retail sales for four years.  Sharifmo primarily sells shoes and children's clothing.  She is requesting this loan to purchase seasonal merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal merchandise

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: Don Josè de 40 años de edad es soltero, habita junto a su familia compuesta por su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos, actualmente trabaja para la alcaldia municipal como colector de ingresos.  solicita financiamiento de su 6to credito para continuar mejorando su casa de habitaciòn, poniendo el piso de la casa ya que una parte esta en mal estado y comprar de material de construcciòn.  Cabe mencionar, que  Jose ha utilizado todos sus creditos para ir mejorando poco a poco su casa y poder brindarle a su familia las condiciones basicas en el hogar. Con el credito anterior logro terminar la cocina, y agradece mucho a kiva por la oportunidad que le estan brindando de ir poco a poco mejorando su casa, pues es la herencia que le dejara a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Josè is an unmarried man of 40 years old who is living with his family consisting of his companion for life and his two children. Currently he works for the City Hall as a revenue collector. 

He is asking for his 6th loan in order to continue improving his home where he lives, putting in the floor of the house as part of it is in a bad state, and to buy construction materials. 

It is worth mentioning that Josè has used all his loans in order to go on improving step by step his home to be able to give his family the basic living conditions. 

With the last loan he finished the kitchen, and he is very grateful to Kiva for the opportunity given to him to improve his house little by little in order to have an inheritance to leave to his children.

loans.use: To make improvements to his house

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David, age 52, runs a tailoring shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for 13 years and has employed three people. He earns an extra income from his dairy farming. He and his wife have four children.

Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to set aside savings from his income. He aspires toward achieving financial stability in the future. 

He has applied for 60,000 Kenya Shillings in order to buy cloth and material for tailoring.

loans.use: to buy cloth and material for tailoring

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius has two businesses. He sells charcoal and he runs a retail shop business. He faces the challenges of price fluctuations in both his endeavors. His family goal is to see his children educated and his business goal is to be able to expand charcoal sales to the city, where there is a ready market, and where he would eventually also like to own a wholesale shop.

Julius intends to use his loan funds to buy sugar, soap and juice to offer for sale in his shop.

Julius lives with his wife and children in a semi-permanent house in Hioma, Uganda.

loans.use: to buy sugar, soap, and juice to offer for sale in his shop

loans.name: Abdurahmon

texts.ru: Абдурахмон женат и в воспитании имеет одного сына. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 4 года он занимается скотоводством. В основном он покупает скот по низкой цене, а потом продает за выгодную цену. Кроме этого он имеет дополнительный доход от денежного перевода от своего сына, который уехал на заработки в Федерации России. Абдурахмон имеет хорошую репутацию и хорошую кредитную историю. Он запрашивает займ для покупки крупного рогатого скота для того чтобы расширить свой бизнес и получить хорошую прибыль ради улучшения благосостояние семьи.
texts.en: Abdurahmon is married and is raising one son.  His wife is involved in household work.  Abdurahmon has been involved in animal husbandry for over four years.  He primarily buys livestock at a low price and then sells it at a more profitable price.  Besides this, he has an additional income from monetary wires from his son, who left to work in the Russian Federation.  Abdurahmon has a good reputation and credit history.  He is requesting this loan to purchase cattle in order to expand his business and make a good profit for the sake of improving his family's welfare.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Isaias Israel

texts.es: Isaías de 25 años de edad es soltero, trabaja para la Alcaldia Muncipal de Juigalpa desde hace 3 años, desempeñandose como Albañil.  Esta solicitando  su 3er credito con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda poniendole la ceramica  a la casa. Con el crédito anterior logro terminar la construcción de un cuarto el cual le permitió tener mayor comodidad con su familia.  Cabe mencionar que Isaias se caracteriza por ser muy responsable con sus compromisos, y con muchos deseos de superacion, pues ademas de trabajar estudia los fines de semana su secundaria.
texts.en: Isaías, 25, is single and has worked for the city in Juigalpa for 3 years as a mason. This is the 3rd loan he has taken out with the goal of improving his house by laying tile. With the previous loan he finished adding a room which will make his family more comfortable. It's worth mentioning that Isaías is very responsible with his commitments and he has a great desire to improve himself. In addition to working, he studies on weekends in order to finish high school.

loans.use: to lay tile in his house.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 44-year-old married Iraqi man with three children. 

In the past, he has worked on construction sites, installing ceiling panels. While the business was good enough to be able to apply and successfully receive and repay a small business loan from Relief International Iraq, he decided 2 years ago to run a small neighborhood market - a typical store where Iraqi families do their shopping.

The business has been doing well, and Ibrahim now took a loan from RI-Iraq in the amount of 2,400 USD to renovate certain parts of the store that he is unable to use now.

loans.use: to pay for renovating parts of his store.

loans.name: Manal

texts.en:
Manal is now 24 years old and single. She lives with her family along with her three brothers. Their father, Abd al Fattah, has a stationery shop. Because Manal is a conservative person, she decided that her father would appear in the photo.

Recently the business has been slowing down, so Manal decided to help her father get new products for the shop so they can serve more customers other than just school students. Doing this will help improve the business and; therefore, improve their family’s life.

loans.use: to help her father buy new products for a stationery shop.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando es un joven casado que actualmente vive solo con su esposa y no tienen bebes. Esta reciente familia vive en la actualmente en la ciudad de Camaná, ubicada en la costa del Perú, la misma que tiene contacto directo con el Océano Pacífico.

Fernando es un hombre al que le gusta practicar natación en la playa y le gusta mucho disfrutar el “Puré de papas”. Para poder salir adelante y mejorar continuamente su calidad de vida ha optado por alquilar habitaciones en su casa para así poder generar algunos ingresos, se dedica diariamente a esta actividad un promedio de 5 horas en las cuales atiende a 3 clientes, producto de este negocio está obteniendo los ingresos que necesita.

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, Fernando podrá realizar algunas mejoras en las habitaciones en donde se hospedan sus inquilinos, con esta nueva satisfacción de sus clientes, él podrá generar mayores y mejores ingresos, está muy contento por esta ayuda y se ha trazado como meta poder construirle otro baño a sus inquilinos.
texts.en:
Fernando is a young married man who lives alone with his wife and has no children. This new family lives at present in the city of Camaná, located on the coast of Peru. The city is directly on the Pacific ocean.  

Fernando is a man who likes to swim at the beach and really enjoys mashed potatoes. In order to get ahead and continuously improve his quality of life, he has opted to rent rooms in his house in order to generate some income. He works at this activity every day an average of 5 hours, attending to 3 customers. With this business, he is obtaining the income he needs.  

With help from the Kiva lenders, he will be able to make some improvements on the rooms where he hosts his renters. With the new customer satisfaction, he will be able to generate more and better income. He is very happy with this help and has set a goal of building a new bathroom for his tenants.

loans.use: to improve the rooms for his tenants.

loans.name: Olga Marina

texts.es:
La señora Olga tiene 50 años de edad, vive en la aldea la Finca, ahi vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos, Olga se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo popular, tiene una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion, todos los dias se levanta bien temprano para abrir su negocio y atender a sus clientes, sus ventas son buenas ya que la calidad de los productos que vende son buenos y los precios son accesibles para las personas de la comunidad.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria, granos basicos, lacteos, pan, refrescos, jugos y huevos, desea surtir su negocio, las exigencias de sus clientes son mayores y no tiene el capital suficiente para comprar la mercaderia.
la meta de Olga es tener una pulperia con muchos productos y asi poder ofrecer de todo a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Señora Olga is 50. She lives in the village of La Finca with her husband and two children. She sells popular consumer items; she has a small store in her home. She gets up very early every day to open her store and tend to her customers. Her sales are good because her products are of good quality and her prices are accessible for the members of her community.
She will use this loan for the purchase of grocery items, basic grains, dairy products, bread, pop, juice and eggs. She wants to stock her business; her customers are demanding more, and she does not have enough capital to buy the merchandise.
Olga's goal is to have a store with many products, and thus to be able to offer her customers everything.

loans.use: to buy groceries, basic grains, dairy products, bread, pop, juice, and eggs.

loans.name: Asmahan

texts.en:
Asmahan is a 40-year-old married lady who only has one son. She is a hard-working mother who works at a private company and after that she works at a hospital. 

After her husband Ata, 63, retired from his work, he opened women's clothes shop so he can continue supporting his family. The shop has been working for the last three years now.

Now Asmahan has applied for a loan to help enhance her husband’s shop by adding more clothes and another section for accessories.

Asmahan preferred that her husband Ata appear in the photo with her.

loans.use: to help enhance her husband’s shop by adding more clothes and another section for accessories.

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es:
Jose Alberto, tiene 33 años de edad, casado desde hace 6 años, tiene dos hijos de 3 años y 2 meses de edad, vive en una aldea sub urbana de San Pedro Sula.
Jose hace tres años se dedica atender su propio negocio, donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar, como ser granos básicos, refrescos, pastas, pan, azúcar, verduras, golosinas y otros. Anteriormente trabajo como guardia de seguridad en una empresa privada. Atiende a sus clientes todo el día. 
Ha hecho crecer su negocio a base de préstamos, actualmente esta solicitando el tercer préstamo, el cual lo invertirá en productos alimenticios como granos básicos, pastas, pan, azúcar etc. para aumentar sus ventas y dar un mejor servicio al cliente. Su propósito es obtener ingresos que mejoren el nivel de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose Alberto, age 33, has been married for six years.  He has two children, a three year old and a two month old baby.  He lives in an urban village of San Pedro Sula.

Jose has been tending to his own business for three years.  He sells food staples like basic grains, pastas, bread, sugar, vegetables, sweets, and others.  He previously worked as a security guard for a private business.  He tends to his customers all day.

He has made his business grow by using loans.  He is currently requesting his third loan.  He will use it to buy food products like basic grains, pastas, bread, and sugar.  He will do this to increase his sales and to give better service to his customers.  His intention is to get income that improves his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to stock his business with food products like basic grains, pasta, sweets, bread, sugar, soft drinks, and others.

loans.name: Ezekiel

texts.en:
Ezekiel is 40 years old. He is married and has three children. He runs a curio shop in Kangemi. Ezekiel has been in business for 12 years now and gets a monthly income of 75,000 shillings.

This will be Ezekiel’s first loan with KADET LTD. He plans to use the entire loan to purchase more stock to sell. With the profit that he will get he wants to expand his curio shop. In the future he wants to be able to invest more in other business ventures.

loans.use: to buy handicrafts to sell

loans.name: Motaz

texts.en:
Motaz is a 56-year-old married man who lives with his family in Madaba.

Motaz started a small business three years ago by opening a fruits and vegetables shop, and because he cares about the freshness of the goods he sells, people come and buy from his shop based on their trust in him and his goods.

Now Motaz has applied for a loan to add more fruits and vegetables so he can expand the shop later on.

loans.use: to add more fruits and vegetables in his store.

loans.name: Kawthar

texts.en:
Kawthar is a 33-year-old married lady. Her husband works at one of the Jordanian universities, while she is a housewife and the mother of three children.

Besides taking care of the children, Kawthar decided to have a small business at home to help in supporting the family, so she filled an un-used room at her house with snacks and candies to sell to the neighborhood children.
 
She has applied for a loan to buy more food products other than snacks to serve the whole neighborhood.

loans.use: to buy more food products other than snacks.

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick is 35 years old and married to Margret. They have three children.

Fredrick has been in the phone accessories business for the last 2 years from which he earns a monthly income of Kes 25,000.  He is applying for his fourth loan of Kes 100,000. He has repaid the previous loans well and in good time. He was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer.

Fredrick hopes to use the funds to buy more phone accessories for sale and use the profits to expand his construction business.

loans.use: To buy phone accessories for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy a variety of merchandise

loans.name: Sanat

texts.ru: Санъат трудолюбивый молодой человек. Он на протяжении 5 лет занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур и скота. У него добрая любящая жена и двое детей. По бизнесу ему помогает жена. Они живут дружно.  У него большие планы на будущее. Он хочет на полученную прибыль от своего бизнеса улучшить свои домашние условия. Для этого он хочет получить займ в размере 5000 сомони для покупки семян ячменя, так как к весеннему посеву ему нужно подготовить землю и семена, также для покупки несколько голов крупного и мелкого рогатого скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Sanat is an industrious young man. For over 5 years he's been engaged in growing crops and raising cattle. He has two children and a loving wife, who helps him with his business. They live in harmony. Sanat has big plans for the future. He would like to use the profits from his business to improve his living conditions. To achieve this, he would like to obtain a loan of 5000 somoni to purchase barley seeds, as he needs to ready the soil and seeds for the spring sowing. He also wants to buy several large and small farm animals. Sanat looks forward to your help and support.

loans.use: to buy barley seeds and farm animals

loans.name: Suren

texts.en:
Suren is 53 years old. He lives in Vanadzor city with his wife and two sons. For about 24 years he has been engaged in the flower trading business: he sells bunches and wreaths in a rented place in market. Suren buys flowers from regional greenhouses and also from providers. Thanks to his business income, he can support his family and also pay for his younger son’s education. 

With his first Kiva loan, Suren has bought a car, which he uses to transport flowers from the greenhouses to his business place. He says the car allows him to decrease his business expenses considerably.

Now he is asking for a 350,000 AMD loan to buy a large lot of various flowers, ribbon and stained paper for his business.

loans.use: to buy a large lot of various flowers, ribbon and stained paper for his business

loans.name: Freddy Jesus

texts.es: El sr. Jesús es un cliente nuevo en la institución que se dedica a la venta de ropa, necesita el crédito  para aumentar su capital de trabajo comprando ropa por cantidad y de temporada,  también para la compra cosas nuevas para fin de año, El Sr. Jesús tiene su pareja, son jóvenes los dos son padres de un niño de un añito y medio, viven en la casa de sus padres,  actualmente vende ropa para damas, varones niños y variados, su domicilio queda ubicado en la zona sur de la ciudad, el Sr. Jesús se encuentra agradecido por la nueva oportunidad que se le brinda y la confianza, al mismo tiempo agradecido por la rapidez en la atención de su solicitud. El Sr. Jesús en la fotografía se encuentra en compañía de su esposa.
texts.en: Jesús is a new client of the institution who sells clothes.  He needs the loan to increase working capital buying seasonal clothes in quantity and also to buy new things for the end of the year.  Jesús has his partner; they are young parents of a little boy who is a year and a half.  They live in his parents’ house.  He currently sells varied women’s, men’s and children’s clothes.  His address is in the south of the city.  Jesús is grateful for the new opportunity and the trust he’s being given while at the same time he’s grateful for the speed with which his loan application was taken care of.  In the photo, Jesús appears with his wife.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothes.

loans.name: En`am

texts.en:
En'am is a 41-year-old housewife with six daughters and a son. Her husband Hasan works as a salesman; he helps his wife with her project and its marketing aspect. 

She discovered that a hobby of hers can be turned into a project she can make money from. She enjoys decorating chocolates and dates, then making creative packages for them. Through her project she is able to help her husband with the household expenses and act as a productive part of the family. 

En'am would like to get a loan so she can expand her work and buy the raw materials needed for her project. Through that she would be helping more in taking care of her seven children.

loans.use: to expand her work and buy the raw materials needed for her project.

loans.name: Jorge Eliecer

texts.es: El señor Jorge a sus 48 años de edad es un emprendedor quien inicia desde hace 11 años su propio negocio de venta de productos por catálogo como perfumes, lociones y fragancias a personas del municipio de la Ceja localizado al oriente de Antioquia y sus veredas. Esta actividad la aprendió viendo trabajar a sus amigos y la alterna con su trabajo como celador. El señor Jorge se encuentra sin capital de trabajo debido a que muchos de sus clientes no le cancelaron sus deudas, por lo que requiere de la compra de nuevo surtido para ofrecer a nuevos clientes y así poder recuperarse y mejorar su calidad de vida, la de su hijo y esposa.
texts.en:
Jorge is 48 years old and an enterprising man who some 11 years ago initiated his own business selling products by catalog, including perfumes, lotions, and fragrances. His clients reside in the municipality of La Ceja, located in the east of Antioquia, and its villages. Jorge learned this activity from watching his friends. He alternates between this and his work as a guard.

Jorge currently lacks capital to invest because many of his customers are not paying their debts. For this reason, he wants to buy new merchandise to offer to new customers and, thus, be able to recuperate and improve his quality of life, as well as that of his wife and son.

loans.use: buy a selection of perfumes to sell to ladies and gentlemen.

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en:
Alfred is 29 years old and married to Jacinta. They have one child.  He has been in his business for the last 7 years, from which he earns a monthly income of Kes 15,000.  He is applying for his third loan of KES 80,000.  He repaid the previous loan well and in good time. He was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer.  

Alfred hopes to use the funds to buy more shop goods to resell and use the profits to open up an M-pesa outlet business in the near future.

loans.use: purchase more food stuffs to resell

loans.name: Carlos Felipe

texts.es: Carlos Felipe tiene 52 años de edad, el se dedica a la venta y compra de gano bovino y porcino en el cual esta actividad la aprendió de su padre que desde muy niño le enseño. Anteriormente se dedica a la crianza de ganado pero viendo la situación económica él decide  mejor trabajar en la compra y venta de ganado para tener más rápido los ingresos y cooperar con los gastos de la familia. Carlos Felipe está solicitando financiamiento para comprar mas ganado.
texts.en: Carlos Felipe, 52, buys and sells cattle and pigs, an activity he learned from his father when he was a little boy and he taught him.  He used to raise cattle but due to the economic situation he decided it was better to go into buying and selling cattle in order to earn income more quickly and cooperate with family expenses.  Carlos Felipe is asking for financing to buy more cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Mramba

texts.en:
Mramba is a resident of Mombasa, Kenya. He is single and is involved in the transport industry, owning a three wheeler vehicle commonly referred to as ‘tuk-tuk’.  He has run this business for two years. He began the business from his savings.
Mramba is applying for a loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to decorate the vehicle in order to attract more customers. His main challenges are high taxation and fuel costs.  Mramba’s ambition is to purchase more of such vehicles in the future.

loans.use: To decorate the vehicle.

loans.name: Pablo Emilio

texts.es:
Pablo, es comerciante de ropa, vive con su familia, su madre y hermanos, es soltero, pero tiene un hijo para quien cubre sus gastos, él inicio con el negocio de la venta de ropa con el apoyo de unos amigos, trabaja de forma ambulante, no tiene un horario establecido, ya que depende de la zona que recorra.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de más ropa, como pantalones, camisas formales y camisetas, con nuevos diseños, este préstamo le ayudara para mejorar el negocio, surtiéndolo de mejor mercadería.
El objetivo de Pablo es que su negocio sea prospero, mejorando las condiciones que sean beneficiosas para él y su familia.
texts.en: Pablo sells clothing and lives at home with his mother and siblings.  He is single but has one son, who he supports.  He began to sell clothes with the help of friends, selling items from place to place and with no fixed schedule, depending on the area he works in.  Pablo seeks this loan to to buy more stock of clothing for re-sale such as pants, formal shirts and casual shirts with new designs.  This loan will help him improve his business by expanding the variety of his products.  Pablo hopes to prosper and to improve the living standards for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy clothing for re-sale: pants, formal shirts and casual shirts.

loans.name: Saeed

texts.en:
Saeed is a 53-year-old man who is supporting a family of seven members; two of his children are college students. 

Saeed has been working at his barber shop for many years, and with each year he enhances the shop whether by adding a new service section or by buying new tools for the shop. 

Now Saeed has applied for a loan to add another seat to the shop to be able to serve more people at the same time and therefore make more profit.

loans.use: to add another seat to his barber shop

loans.name: Salah

texts.en:
Salah a 48-year-old hardworking man, is supporting a family of six members. For that he has to work two jobs: as a construction driver, and selling chickens at his store. 

It has been three years since he opened his chicken shop, and now he has applied for a loan to expand the shop and bring more chickens to cover the market demand.

loans.use: to expand the shop and bring more chickens to cover the market demand

loans.name: Nuha

texts.en:
Nuha is a 42-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of seven children.

Nuha is selling clothes. She is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase more quantities of clothes for trading purposes.
Nuha is looking to open a shop for her clothes and improve her family living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 30-year-old man from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and he is requesting a loan of 700 JD to finance part of his wedding expenses.

loans.use: to finance part of his wedding expenes

loans.name: Firuzjon

texts.ru: Фирузджон молодой предприниматель ОН любящий муж и отец двоих детей. Он работает на арендованном земельном участке, занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур и овощей. Он имеет пятилетний опыт работы на земле. Выращенный урожай продает на рынке и на остаток откармливает скот. Он хочет получить займ в размере 3000 сомони для приобретения минеральных удобрений и покупки ГСМ для техники. Он надеется, что вы поддержите его и представите займ. Спасибо за понимание.
texts.en:
Firuzjon is a young entrepreneur.  He is a loving husband and father of two young children.  He works on a rented piece of land where he grows crops and vegetables.  He has five years of experience in working on the land.   He sells his harvest at the market and, with what is left over, he fattens cattle. 

Firuzjon wants to take out a loan of 3000 somoni to buy mineral fertilizers and fuel for his farm equipment.  He hopes that you will support him and provide him with the loan.  Thank you for your understanding.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and fuel.

loans.name: Sharofat

texts.ru: Шарофат проживает в городе Куляб. Ей 34 года. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж работает в управлении юстиции района Хамадони. Сама она имеет средне – специальное образование. По специальности она медсестра. На сегодняшний день Шарофат занимается торговлей парфюмерии. Она берет кредит для приобретения мужских наборов духов и шампуней.
texts.en: Sharofat lives in the city of Kulob.  She is 34 years old, married and has three children.  Her husband works at the judiciary administration of the Hamadoni district.  Sharofat is a nurse.  Today, she is involved in selling perfumery products.  Sharofat is requesting this loan to purchase sets of men's perfumes and shampoo.

loans.use: to purchase sets of men's perfumes and shampoo

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 26-year-old married man who lives with his wife and only daughter. He lives in Um Al-heiran, just outside of Amman.
Mohammad runs his own little food market that provides the basics for daily customers. He is interested in expanding the variety of products in his market, and opening a second market to serve another part of his locality. This will help him increase his profit and provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to open a second food market.

loans.name: Sheraz

texts.en:
Sheraz is a 38-year-old married woman from Irbid, Jordan, and has two children.
Sheraz has her own grocery store, which started as a home-based project but expanded to be a separate shop away from her home. She is now requesting a loan of 700 JD to purchase more fruits and vegetables for the store. Sheraz is looking to improve her business as well as improving her family's living conditions.
Due to cultural reasons, the man in the photo is Sheraz's husband.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables for her store.

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en:
Because Asmaa is a conservative person, she asked her son Khaled to appear in the photo instead. Asmaa is a 48-year-old housewife married to Mr. Mahfooz, a taxi driver, and she has one daughter.
Wanting a better life for herself and her family, Asmaa contributes to paying the household expenses through selling different products, from home tools to antiques and so on. She sells to all her friends and neighbors and has obtained a good reputation in her community. Now she would like a loan to buy more products and increase her sales in the hope of obtaining enough money to open a small store instead of selling products in her home. This will lead to an increase in sales and an expansion of her customer base, therefore improving her family’s lifestyle.

loans.use: to open a small store.

loans.name: Abd Al Muhsen

texts.en:
Abd Al Muhsen is a 43-year-old married man from Al Hashmi-Amman, Jordan, and a father of four children. He has a grocery store and is requesting a loan of 1,500 JOD to purchase more goods for his store.
Abd Al Muhsen is looking to improve his family's living conditions as well as open another branch of his store.

loans.use: to purchase goods for his grocery store.

loans.name: Rami

texts.en:
Rami, an ambitious 29-year-old married man, lives just outside Amman city. He has one daughter. 
Having a strong will to start his own business, Rami opened his own store to sell all kinds of cleaning equipment, a project that provides a dignified life for his family. In the hope of achieving his dream of having his own project, Rami would like a loan to expand his store and add a variety of new products. This will serve his community, increase his profits, and enable him to continue to live dependent on himself and providing for his family.

loans.use: to expand his store and add a variety of new products.

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es: Juan José vive en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual lo conforma su esposa e hijos. El Señor Juan es un hombre muy trabajador, dedicado y responsable. Ha trabajado desde hace 19 años para poder casar adelante a su familia. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado establecer una pequeña tiendita en su hogar de residencia en la cual vende variedad de artículos tales como: golosinas, cereales, detergente, verduras, etc. Su negocio lo tiene instalado en su hogar de residencia y gracias al tiempo que tiene de dedicarse al mismo  ya cuenta con mucha experiencia en el área. Cuenta con buen número de clientes fijos los cuales cada día lo prefieren mas por ser un hombre dedicado y sobre todo carismático el cual siempre atiende su negocio con mucho entusiasmo. Ya que es un hombre emprendedor ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL de tal forma que pueda invertir en mercadería para surtir su negocio aprovechando que la temporada navideña ya comenzó y es una buena oportunidad para mejor los niveles de venta. El crédito lo quiere para comprar productos de tienda tales como: arroz, frijoles, golosinas, pan dulce, aceite, leche, variedad de condimentos, detergente, etc. De tal manera que esto le permita mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia que día con día se pone más difícil y es necesario buscar nuevas formas de adquirir otros ingresos para poder dar a su familia todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Juan José lives in his own house with his family, consisting of his wife and children. Juan is a very hard-hard-working, dedicated, and responsible man. 

He has worked for 19 years to help his family get ahead in life. With a lot of effort and dedication he has managed to set up a small store in his home, where he sells a variety of goods, such as candy, cereal grains, detergent, vegetables etc. 

He has set up his business in his home, and because of the time he has to devote to it, he now has a lot of experience in this area. He has a good number of steady customers, who prefer him more every day, because he is a dedicated and especially charming man, who always tends his business  with a lot of enthusiasm. 

Since he is an enterprising man, he has decided to apply to Integral for this loan. This is in order to invest in merchandise for stocking his business, taking advantage of the Christmas season that has already begun. This is a good opportunity to increase his sales. 

He wants the loan to buy rice, beans, candy, sweet breads, cooking oil, milk, a variety of condiments, and detergent.

This way, he will be able to improve his quality of life, and that of his family. Day by day life becomes more difficult, and it is necessary to look for new ways of earning other income, in order to provide for all his family's needs.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, candy, sweet breads, cooking oil, milk, a variety of condiments, and detergent.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a 33-year-old married woman from Al Salt, Al Balqa, Jordan, and a mother of five children.
Amal has a grocery store and she is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to purchase food products for the store. She is looking to improve her family's living conditions.
Due to cultural reasons, Amal's husband is shown in the photograph rather than Amal.

loans.use: to purchase food products for her store.

loans.name: Foziljon

texts.ru: Фозилджон женат и любящий отец двоих детей. Жена работает в столовой поваром, а он занимается скотоводством. Фозилджон откармливает мелкий и крупный рогатый скот  дома за определенный период, а затем продает за выгодную цену. Фозилджон хочет расширить свой бизнес и улучшить жилищные условия. Он запрашивает займ в размере 3000$ США для покупки крупного рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарит вас за доброту.
texts.en: Foziljon is married and is a loving father of two children.  His wife works as a cook at a cafeteria, and he is involved in animal husbandry.  Foziljon fattens up small livestock and cattle at home over a set period of time and then sells it at a more profitable price.  He wants to expand his business and improve his living conditions.  He is requesting a loan in the sum of $3000 for the purchase of cattle in order to expand his business. Foziljon relies on your help and thanks you in advance for your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Abdurahmon

texts.ru: Абдурахмон женат имеет  двоих детей. Жена домохозяйка помогает мужу в бизнесе. Он на содержании также имеет своих родителей. У него свой земельный участок от работы на нем он имеет хорошую прибыль. Он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур и на отходы откармливает скот.
